DOC.detailed_description: Methods . Randomized , double blind , placebo-controlled clinical trial . We select 104 postmenopausal woman , age 45 65 , uncomplicated T2DM BMI ≥25 . Women history kidney liver disease , BMI > 40 , autoimmune disease cancer include study . Participants randomly assign receive either capsule contain 4,000 IU vitamin D3 ( cholecalciferol , n=52 ) placebo ( n=52 ) , day 6 month . Outcome variables serum CRP , measure high-sensitivity assay ( nephelometry ) , HOMA-IR . Serum vitamin D ( 25-OH-D ) measure HPLC . Outcome variable measure baseline , 3 6 month thereafter . All participant receive diet physical activity counseling , visit clinic medical check-up month . Baseline Results . Mean age 56.8 ± 5.1 y. Baseline BMI 30.7 ± 3.9 . Median CRP concentration 5.0 mg/L ( Interquartile range : 1.0 , 8.5 ) . HOMA index baseline 7.13 ± 3.8 . Serum 25-OH-D concentration baseline 54.5 ± 15.7 nmol/L ( ~22 ng/mL ) .
